coreAttributes.authorTag: A small sticker informs you that this was made by a 'Zyro'.
coreAttributes.name: Viper Armour
coreAttributes.description: The Viper Gauntlets are composed of extraterrestrial materials designed to be worn by snake women from another world.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off the Viper Armour, it takes quite a while.
displacementText.playerNPC: You remove [npc.name]'s Viper Armour, it takes quite a while.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s Viper Armour and start to tear it apart piece by piece.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] takes off [npc.her] Viper Armour, it takes quite a while.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] takes off your Viper Armour, it takes quite a while.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your Viper Armour and starts to tear it apart piece by piece.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] takes off [npc2.name]'s Viper Armour, it takes quite a while.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s Viper Armour starts to tear it apart piece by piece.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the Viper Armour, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put the Viper Armour on [npc.name]'s body, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the Viper Armour onto [npc.her] body, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] puts on the Viper Armour, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] equips you with the Viper Armour, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the Viper Armour onto your body, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] equips the Viper Armour on [npc2.name], it takes quite a while.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the Viper Armour onto [npc2.name]'s body, it takes quite a while.

displacementText.playerSelf: You spend some time removing parts of your Viper Armour, careful not to kill yourself in the process.
displacementText.playerNPC: You spend some time removing parts of [npc.name]'s Viper Armour, careful not to kill both of you in the process.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name] and start to tear off the pieces of [npc.her] Viper Armour.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] spends some time removing parts of [npc.her] Viper Armour, careful not to kill [npc.her]self in the process.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] spends some time removing parts of your Viper Armour, careful not to kill both of you in the process.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of you and starts to tear off the pieces of your Viper Armour.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] spends some time removing parts of [npc2.name]'s Viper Armour, careful not to kill both of you in the process.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name] and starts to tear off the pieces of [npc2.her]'s Viper Armour.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put back the missing pieces on your Viper Armour.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put back the missing pieces on [npc.name]'s Viper Armour.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you haphazardly piece together [npc.her] Viper Armour.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] puts back the missing pieces on her Viper Armour.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts back the missing pieces of your Viper Armour.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] haphazardly piece together your Viper Armour.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts back the missing pieces together [npc2.name]'s Viper Armour.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold [npc2.name] and starts to haphazardly piece together [npc2.her] Viper Armour.
